itemLabel: Iain Vallance, Baron Vallance of Tummel

wikipedia_page.main: Iain David Thomas Vallance, Baron Vallance of Tummel,  (born 20 May 1943) is a British businessman and a retired  Liberal Democrat member of the House of Lords.

In 1967 Vallance married Iain Vallance, Baron Vallance of Tummel, with whom she had two children. She died in July 2020.
